title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente.
While the spaghetti is cooking, whisk the eggs in a bowl and add the grated parmesan cheese.
Fry the bacon in a pan until crispy, then chop into small pieces.
Drain the spaghetti, reserving some of the cooking water.
Add the spaghetti to the pan with the bacon, then pour in the egg and cheese mixture.
Toss the spaghetti in the sauce, adding a little of the reserved cooking water to loosen the sauce if needed.
Season with black pepper and salt to taste.
Serve hot with extra parmesan cheese on top.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt, ginger garlic paste, and all the spices for at least 2 hours.
Grill the marinated chicken until cooked through.
In a separate pan, heat the butter and add the tomato puree.
Cook the tomato puree until the oil separates from the mixture.
Add the cream and cook for another 5 minutes.
Add the grilled chicken to the tomato cream sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with naan or rice.

title: Sushi Rolls
summary: Delicious Japanese sushi rolls with fresh fish, rice, and seaweed.
ingredients: Soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger for serving
instructions: Rinse the sushi rice in cold water until the water runs clear.
Cook the rice with water in a rice cooker or on the stovetop.
In a small saucepan, heat the rice vinegar, sugar, and salt until dissolved.
Spread the cooked rice on a large plate and drizzle the vinegar mixture over it.
Mix the rice and vinegar gently to combine.
Place a sheet of nori on a bamboo sushi mat.
Spread a thin layer of rice on the nori, leaving a 1-inch border at the top.
Arrange the fish and vegetables in a line across the rice.
Roll the sushi tightly using the bamboo mat.
Slice the sushi roll into bite-sized pieces.
Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: Classic Italian pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 450°F (230°C).
Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface to your desired thickness.
Spread the tomato sauce over the pizza dough, leaving a 1-inch border around the edges.
Sprinkle the mozzarella cheese over the tomato sauce.
Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is bubbly.
Remove the pizza from the oven and top with fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Slice and serve hot.
